title: Owning a Pony : A Guide for Beginners
brief_description: Any parent considering buying a pony for their child would benefit from the advice offered in this film which is aimed at encouraging the child to take an active responsibility in the care of the pony. The aspects of “Owning a pony” covered in this program are “Buying a pony”, “Accommodation”, “Equipment”, “Feeding”, “Mucking-out”, “Grooming”, “Cleaning tack” and “Tacking up”.
